textos_fuente.text: Family Fun Awaits at Tropical Breeze Fun Park | Mini-Golf & GellyBall in Cape Coral Follow Follow Follow Follow  239-574-3939  info@tropicalbreezefunpark.com Rewards Signup Member Login/Balance Home Mini-Golf GellyBall Pricing Birthday Parties & Group Events Group Events Birthday Parties Photo Gallery FAQs About Us Free Loyalty Program Food & Drinks Join Our Team Donation Request Contact Us  239-574-3939 Home Mini-Golf GellyBall Pricing Birthday Parties & Group Events Group Events Birthday Parties Photo Gallery FAQs About Us Free Loyalty Program Food & Drinks Join Our Team Donation Request Contact Us Mini-Golf and GellyBall Fun in Cape Coral Just Minutes from Fort Myers! Your go-to destination for unforgettable adventures, perfect for families, friends, and special celebrations. Mini-Golf and GellyBall Fun in Cape Coral, Just Minutes from Fort Myers! Your go-to destination for unforgettable adventures, perfect for families, friends, and special celebrations. Why Mini-Golf & GellyBall Are Perfect for Your Day Out Mini-Golf Challenge your skills on our tropical-themed course, home to the world’s longest mini-golf hole. Designed for all ages, it’s a blend of fun, challenge, and creativity. Enjoy our on-course drink delivery for ultimate convenience, and track your progress with electronic scoring —scores are even posted live on our monitor for a competitive edge! Beverage Options: While you play, sip on a selection of beer, wine, wine slushies, seltzers, or Coke products to keep refreshed. GellyBall Gear up for non-stop excitement with our family-friendly GellyBall battles! Perfect for parties, groups, or a spontaneous day of fun, GellyBall combines strategy, laughter, and friendly competition. When the sun sets, the fun doesn’t stop. Get ready for an epic battle under our black-lit field, where obstacles come alive in glowing light for a thrilling nighttime adventure. Plan Your Visit Ready for a day full of fun? Swing by 234 Santa Barbara Blvd in Cape Coral to dive into a mini-golf adventure or jump into an epic GellyBall session—no reservations needed! Planning a special celebration? Book your party online and let us help make it unforgettable. How We Make Every Visit Special Pristine Facilities Our park is always clean, well-maintained, and designed with safety in mind, so you can focus on having fun without any worries. Friendly Staff From the moment you arrive, our team is here to make your day unforgettable, providing guidance, assistance, and plenty of smiles. Prime Location Conveniently located just minutes from Fort Myers, Tropical Breeze Fun Park offers easy access and free parking for a stress-free visit. Family-Friendly Atmosphere Whether you’re here for mini-golf, GellyBall, or a special celebration, we create a welcoming environment where every guest feels at home. Celebrate Life’s Best Moments with Us Looking for the perfect place to throw a party? Tropical Breeze Fun Park has you covered with everything you need for an unforgettable celebration! Birthday Parties: From kids to adults, our parties are packed with fun. Enjoy exclusive access to GellyBall battles, mini-golf, and party pavilions designed for endless enjoyment. Special Events: Whether it’s a holiday gathering, school function, or community celebration, we provide the perfect space and activities to make your event stand out. Group Events: Family reunions, corporate team-building, or sports team celebrations—we create an atmosphere where groups can connect and have fun. Stress-Free Planning: With online booking and helpful staff, hosting a party or event has never been easier. We take care of the details so you can enjoy the day. Make your next celebration one to remember! What Our Guests Have To Say Jennifer Rodin Designation Best mini golf ever! The water features and the little signs and of course the drinks, the other customers, and the workers were just amazing! The music was really great too. We had so much fun. We'll definitely be back again! Coleen Wybranski Designation We chose this as an alternative to Topgolf, and are so glad that we did — it was a miles better alternative for our young family. The staff was super sweet and attentive, and nowhere else will you find such a prompt on-course delivery service! The next time we’re in Florida we’re definitely going to make this a destination. Tiffany Rollman Designation This was hands down the best maintained course my kids and I have ever been on. The kids loved the different challenges on each hole and the electronic score card was an awesome addition. It is clear that the staff care about the upkeep, because the course is in pristine condition and they do a stunning job with the landscaping. We definitely plan to come back when we travel here again next year! Mike Humphreys Designation Had a lot of fun, very nice place with fun Putt-Putt holes. Prices weren't too bad and they also serve alcohol (wine slushies/beer) It's a very well maintained park with some challenging holes, including the "world's longest putt-putt hole" which is the 18th hole. We had a nice time, the employees were very nice and we all just had a fun time. I would definitely recommend to anyone that hasn't been here yet, it's a good time! 4 5  Address 234 Santa Barbara Blvd, Cape Coral, FL 33991  Phone 239-574-3939  Email info@tropicalbreezefunpark.com } Mini-Golf Hours Sunday – Saturday:  10 AM – 10PM Weather Permitting } GellyBall Hours Open Play Friday- Sunday :  5 PM – 10PM For other time slots, please call to make a reservation. Pricing | Mini-Golf, GellyBall & Party Packages at Tropical Breeze Fun Park Follow Follow Follow Follow  239-574-3939  info@tropicalbreezefunpark.com Rewards Signup Member Login/Balance Home Mini-Golf GellyBall Pricing Birthday Parties & Group Events Group Events Birthday Parties Photo Gallery FAQs About Us Free Loyalty Program Food & Drinks Join Our Team Donation Request Contact Us  239-574-3939 Home Mini-Golf GellyBall Pricing Birthday Parties & Group Events Group Events Birthday Parties Photo Gallery FAQs About Us Free Loyalty Program Food & Drinks Join Our Team Donation Request Contact Us Mini-Golf & GellyBall in Cape Coral Find the perfect option for your next day of fun or celebration. Plan Your Fun at Tropical Breeze Fun Park! At Tropical Breeze Fun Park, we offer exciting activities and packages to ensure everyone has a memorable experience. Whether you’re here for mini-golf, GellyBall, or a special event, we’ve got options for all ages and interests! Miniature Golf Pricing Adult: $15.50 Senior: $13.00 Military/Police/Fire: $12.00 Child (4-16): $13.75 Child (3 & Under): Free ( with a paying adult ) Replay: $3.00 Challenge your skills on our beautifully designed mini-golf course, featuring the world’s longest mini-golf hole and tropical-themed fun for everyone. Track your progress with electronic scoring and enjoy a cold beverage delivered by the staff at Tropical Breeze. GellyBall Pricing Missions on Field: $15.00 ( Reservations Preferred ) Includes 2 hoppers (1500 ammo) Hopper Refill: $5.00 Glow ball Gellyball: $20 (after sunset under Black lights) Experience the thrill of GellyBall! Perfect for all ages 6 and up, GellyBall combines the fun of paintball with a low-impact, mess-free twist. Try our nighttime black-lit field for an extra layer of excitement! Combo Packs SAVE 30% Mini Golf & GellyBall: $25.00 Includes 2 hoppers (1500 ammo). Get the best of both worlds with our combo packs. Perfect for families and groups looking for a full day of fun! Party Packages Planning a special event? Our party packages are designed to provide a stress-free, unforgettable experience for you and your guests. Birdie Package Activity: 18 holes of mini-golf Price: $18.95 per guest (plus tax) BOOK NOW Eagle Package Activity: 1 hour of Extreme Outdoor GellyBall Price: $22.95 per guest (plus tax) BOOK NOW Hole-in-One Package Activities: 30 minutes of GellyBall missions followed by 18 holes of mini-golf Price: $24.95 per guest (plus tax) BOOK NOW Group Events and Special Rates We also offer customizable packages and special rates for: Schools and Camps Corporate Events Non-Profit Organizations Military Groups Special Needs Groups Our expert planners are here to help you create the perfect event for your group. From team-building activities to school outings, we’ve got everything covered! Contact Us  Address 234 Santa Barbara Blvd, Cape Coral, FL 33991  Phone 239-574-3939  Email info@tropicalbreezefunpark.com } Mini-Golf Hours Sunday – Saturday:  10 AM – 10PM Weather Permitting } GellyBall Hours Open Play Friday- Sunday :  5 PM – 10PM For other time slots, please call to make a reservation. FAQs | Tropical Breeze Fun Park in Cape Coral Follow Follow Follow Follow  239-574-3939  info@tropicalbreezefunpark.com Rewards Signup Member Login/Balance Home Mini-Golf GellyBall Pricing Birthday Parties & Group Events Group Events Birthday Parties Photo Gallery FAQs About Us Free Loyalty Program Food & Drinks Join Our Team Donation Request Contact Us  239-574-3939 Home Mini-Golf GellyBall Pricing Birthday Parties & Group Events Group Events Birthday Parties Photo Gallery FAQs About Us Free Loyalty Program Food & Drinks Join Our Team Donation Request Contact Us Tropical Breeze Fun Park FAQs: Your Questions Answered Find everything you need to know about visiting Cape Coral’s favorite fun park. Everything You Need to Know for a Fun Day at Tropical Breeze Fun Park At Tropical Breeze Fun Park, we believe every visit should be an adventure filled with laughter, fun, and unforgettable memories. Whether you’re a first-time guest or one of our loyal fans, we’ve got everything you need to make the most of your time with us. From thrilling attractions like our GellyBall battles and the world’s longest mini-golf hole to hosting incredible group events and birthday parties, we’re here to ensure your day is seamless and full of excitement. To help you plan your visit, we’ve compiled answers to the most frequently asked questions about our park, activities, and policies below. Learn about our raincheck guarantee, the best times to visit, event planning options, and so much more—all in one place. Still have questions? No problem! Our friendly team is always ready to help. Whether you need details about booking an event or tips for your first GellyBall session, we’re just a call or email away. Contact Us Choose Topics General Mini-Golf GellyBall Events Can’t Find Answers? Don’t worry, our team will help you  239-574-3939 What is your weather/raincheck policy? We offer a worry-free weather guarantee! If the park closes due to weather, guests will receive a free return ticket. If operations are suspended for more than 30 consecutive minutes, a rain check will be issued for a return visit. Can I drop off my children and leave? Children under 16 must be accompanied by an adult. Can we bring our own food to the park? No outside food is permitted. However, we’re happy to cater your event with a variety of food and drink options. What are your hours of operation? Mini-golf is open daily from 10:00 AM to 10:00 PM, while GellyBall operates Friday through Sunday from 5:00 PM to 10:00 PM. For other time slots, please call to make a reservation.  You can also call to find out our holiday hours. Are you hiring? Yes! We’re always looking for exceptional team members. Check out our Join Our Team page to apply. What makes your mini-golf course special? Our tropical-themed course features cascading waterfalls, adventurous holes, and the world’s longest mini-golf hole! It’s fun and challenging for all ages. How long does it take to complete the course? Most guests finish our 18-hole course in about 60-90 minutes, depending on group size and pace. What is GellyBall? GellyBall is a revolutionary, low-impact shooting game suitable for all ages. Our battery-powered blasters shoot hydrated gel orbs that are biodegradable, non-toxic, and non-staining. What is a GellyBall Blaster? The electric blaster shoots water-filled orbs. If you hold the trigger, it can fire up to 10 balls per second, quickly using up ammo. We advise players to shoot in quick bursts to conserve ammo. The ammo pod, called a “Hand Grenade,” holds 750 GellyBalls. The blaster accurately shoots up to 100 feet! Does it hurt to get shot? No, unlike paintball, the GellyBall Blaster uses very low pressure, making it virtually pain-free—only feeling like a flick of a finger. But you’ll be having so much fun, you won’t even notice! How many players can participate? We can host up to 10 players at a time, with larger groups rotating through teams to keep everyone engaged. What if I run out of ammo? Additional ammo can be purchased on-site to keep the fun going. Do you clean the equipment? Yes! Between users, we clean and disinfect the gear. Can you host private events? Absolutely! We specialize in birthday parties, corporate events, school outings, and more. Check out our Group Events and Birthday Parties pages for customizable packages. Do you offer fundraising opportunities? Yes, our fundraising program is available for schools, non-profits, and other organizations. Contact us to learn more about how we can help your group raise funds while having fun. Have More Questions? If you need additional information or have specific questions, don’t hesitate to contact us. We’re here to ensure your visit is as fun and hassle-free as possible!  239-574-3939  Address 234 Santa Barbara Blvd, Cape Coral, FL 33991  Phone 239-574-3939  Email info@tropicalbreezefunpark.com } Mini-Golf Hours Sunday – Saturday:  10 AM – 10PM Weather Permitting } GellyBall Hours Open Play Friday- Sunday :  5 PM – 10PM For other time slots, please call to make a reservation. Best Group Event Venue in Cape Coral | Tropical Breeze Fun Park Follow Follow Follow Follow  239-574-3939  info@tropicalbreezefunpark.com Rewards Signup Member Login/Balance Home Mini-Golf GellyBall Pricing Birthday Parties & Group Events Group Events Birthday Parties Photo Gallery FAQs About Us Free Loyalty Program Food & Drinks Join Our Team Donation Request Contact Us  239-574-3939 Home Mini-Golf GellyBall Pricing Birthday Parties & Group Events Group Events Birthday Parties Photo Gallery FAQs About Us Free Loyalty Program Food & Drinks Join Our Team Donation Request Contact Us The Best Group Event Venue in Cape Coral Host unforgettable events with activities that inspire fun, teamwork, and celebration. Why Choose Tropical Breeze for Your Group Event? At Tropical Breeze Fun Park, we specialize in creating unforgettable group events tailored to your needs. From corporate team-building to family reunions, we provide the perfect setting for fun, bonding, and lasting memories. Here’s Why Groups Love Us: Customizable Packages: Designed to fit your group’s size, budget, and goals. Exciting Activities: Mini-golf and GellyBall foster teamwork and friendly competition. Beautiful Setting: A tropical-themed venue in the heart of Cape Coral. Hassle-Free Planning: Our team takes care of the details so you can enjoy the day. Z Corporate Team-Building Events Elevate Your Team with Fun and Friendly Competition Looking to boost morale and teamwork? Our corporate event options are designed to build stronger connections within your team. Perfect for management retreats, employee recognition days, and team-building activities. GellyBall Missions: Compete on our field with custom missions to see which team comes out on top. Mini-Golf: Encourage collaboration and bonding with our tropical-themed course. Z Celebrations for Every Occasion Whether you’re celebrating milestones or simply looking for a great day out, we’re here to make your event special. We’re Perfect For: Family reunions Sports team banquets Bar/Bat Mitzvahs Graduation parties After-prom celebrations Teacher appreciation events No matter the occasion, our event experts will customize a package to meet your needs. Z School Outings and Fundraising Reward, Educate, and Raise Funds—all in One Place! Bring the classroom to life with entertaining and educational activities at Tropical Breeze. School Field Trips: Combine fun and learning with engaging activities that explore Newton’s Laws of Motion and teamwork. Teacher Appreciation: Celebrate your school’s educators with a day of relaxation and fun. Fundraising Events: Partner with us to create exciting fundraising opportunities for your school or non-profit organization. DOWNLOAD DONATION REQUEST FORM We review donation requests monthly, so submit yours in advance to secure support for your event. Z Summer Camp and Seasonal Events Calling All Campers and Counselors! From shooting range challenges to conquering the world’s longest mini-golf hole, we provide the perfect backdrop for summer camp fun. Tailored Camp Packages: Create lasting memories with activities designed for campers of all ages. Safe and Fun After-Prom Parties: Celebrate in a secure environment with exciting activities. Graduation Lock-Ins: Keep the whole class entertained all night long. Z Film Location Rentals Whether you’re filming a commercial, creating content for social media, or shooting a feature film, our park’s unique features will elevate your production and make it truly memorable. Eye-catching tropical scenery perfect for a variety of genres. Distinct attractions like the world’s longest mini-golf hole and GellyBall fields. Flexible scheduling to accommodate your project needs. Contact Tropical Breeze: info@tropicalbreezefunpark.com 239-574-3939 Important Event Information Non-Refundable Deposit: A $75.00 deposit is required for all events. Rain Policy: In case of threatening rain, Tropical Breeze may cancel the event in consultation with the event coordinator. Deposits can be refunded or applied to a new date. Cancellation Policy: Deposits can be applied to a new date if cancellations are made at least 7 days in advance. CONTACT US TO BOOK TODAY Book Your Group Event at Cape Coral’s Favorite Fun Park! Looking for the ultimate venue for your next group event? Whether it’s a corporate retreat, family reunion, school outing, or celebration with friends, Tropical Breeze Fun Park offers customized packages, exciting activities like mini-golf and GellyBall, and a stress-free planning experience. Contact Us Today to Make Your Event Unforgettable: Learn more about our flexible packages tailored to your needs. Check availability for your preferred date. Get expert help planning every detail of your event. Creating Memories That Last a Lifetime in Cape Coral At Tropical Breeze Fun Park , we’re dedicated to bringing people together for unforgettable adventures. Located in beautiful Cape Coral, our park offers something for everyone—whether you’re looking for thrilling activities, a place to celebrate, or a relaxing day of fun. We believe in creating memories that last a lifetime. Here’s why Tropical Breeze Fun Park is Cape Coral’s favorite destination: Z Mini-Golf Like No Other Enjoy 18 challenging holes on our tropical-themed course, featuring cascading waterfalls and the world’s longest mini-golf hole. Z Adrenaline-Pumping GellyBall Dive into action-packed GellyBall battles. Perfect for all ages! Z Perfect for Events From birthdays to corporate gatherings, we make planning easy with customizable packages and dedicated party hosts. Z Convenient Location Just minutes from Fort Myers, with free parking and a safe, family-friendly atmosphere. CHECK OUR PRICES What Our Guests Have To Say Jennifer Rodin Designation Best mini golf ever! The water features and the little signs and of course the drinks, the other customers, and the workers were just amazing! The music was really great too. We had so much fun. We'll definitely be back again! Coleen Wybranski Designation We chose this as an alternative to Topgolf, and are so glad that we did — it was a miles better alternative for our young family. The staff was super sweet and attentive, and nowhere else will you find such a prompt on-course delivery service! The next time we’re in Florida we’re definitely going to make this a destination. Tiffany Rollman Designation This was hands down the best maintained course my kids and I have ever been on. The kids loved the different challenges on each hole and the electronic score card was an awesome addition. It is clear that the staff care about the upkeep, because the course is in pristine condition and they do a stunning job with the landscaping. We definitely plan to come back when we travel here again next year! Mike Humphreys Designation Had a lot of fun, very nice place with fun Putt-Putt holes. Prices weren't too bad and they also serve alcohol (wine slushies/beer) It's a very well maintained park with some challenging holes, including the "world's longest putt-putt hole" which is the 18th hole. We had a nice time, the employees were very nice and we all just had a fun time. I would definitely recommend to anyone that hasn't been here yet, it's a good time! 4 5 Make Every Visit More Rewarding! Turn your fun into rewards with the Tropical Breeze Loyalty Program! It’s free to join and packed with perks designed to make your visits even more exciting. From earning points on every purchase to receiving special birthday bonuses, this is the ultimate way to get more out of your time at the park. Don’t miss out on: Exclusive rewards and cash back on purchases. Special offers just for members. Fun bonuses throughout the year! JOIN OUR LOYALTY PROGRAM Plan Your Visit Today!
